fullText: Michael Stuhlbarg gives a commanding performance as Boris Berezovsky, the Russian oligarch whose relationship with Vladimir Putin is at the center of Peter Morgan's fact-based drama.
dtliExcerpt: Michael Stuhlbarg gives a commanding performance as Boris Berezovsky, the Russian oligarch whose relationship with Vladimir Putin is at the center of Peter Morgan's fact-based drama.
